verses.verse: Then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "Depart, <S%H1980><s%> go <S%H5927><s%> up from here, <S%H2088><s%> you and the people <S%H5971><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> you have brought <S%H5927><s%> up from the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> to the land <S%H776><s%> of which <S%H834><s%> I swore <S%H7650><s%> to Abraham, <S%H85><s%> Isaac, <S%H3327><s%> and Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> 'To your descendants <S%H2233><s%> I will give <S%H5414><s%> it.'

"And I will send <S%H7971><s%> an angel <S%H4397><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you and I will drive <S%H1644><s%> out the Canaanite, <S%H3669><s%> the Amorite, <S%H567><s%> the Hittite, <S%H2850><s%> the Perizzite, <S%H6522><s%> the Hivite <S%H2340><s%> and the Jebusite. <S%H2983><s%>

"[Go <S%H5927><s%> up] to a land <S%H776><s%> flowing <S%H2100><s%> with milk <S%H2461><s%> and honey; <S%H1706><s%> for I will not go up in your midst, <S%H7130><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> you are an obstinate <S%H7186><s%> <S%H6203><s%> people, <S%H5971><s%> lest <S%H6435><s%> I destroy <S%H3615><s%> you on the way. <S%H1870><s%>"

When the people <S%H5971><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> sad <S%H7451><s%> word, <S%H1697><s%> they went <S%H56><s%> into mourning, <S%H56><s%> and none <S%H3808><s%> <S%H376><s%> of them put <S%H7896><s%> on his ornaments. <S%H5716><s%>

For the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "Say <S%H559><s%> to the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> 'You are an obstinate <S%H7186><s%> <S%H6203><s%> people; <S%H5971><s%> should I go <S%H5927><s%> up in your midst <S%H7130><s%> for one <S%H259><s%> moment, <S%H7281><s%> I would destroy <S%H3615><s%> you. Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore, put <S%H3381><s%> off <S%H3381><s%> your ornaments <S%H5716><s%> from you, that I may know <S%H3045><s%> what <S%H4100><s%> I will do <S%H6213><s%> with you.'"
So the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> stripped <S%H5337><s%> themselves of their ornaments <S%H5716><s%> from Mount <S%H2022><s%> Horeb <S%H2722><s%> [onward.]

Now Moses <S%H4872><s%> used to take <S%H3947><s%> the tent <S%H168><s%> and pitch <S%H5186><s%> it outside <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2351><s%> the camp, <S%H4264><s%> a good <S%H7368><s%> distance <S%H7368><s%> from the camp, <S%H4264><s%> and he called <S%H7121><s%> it the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting. <S%H4150><s%> And it came <S%H1961><s%> about, that everyone <S%H3605><s%> who sought <S%H1245><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> would go <S%H3318><s%> out to the tent <S%H168><s%> of meeting <S%H4150><s%> which <S%H834><s%> was outside <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2351><s%> the camp. <S%H4264><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> about, whenever Moses <S%H4872><s%> went <S%H3318><s%> out to the tent, <S%H168><s%> that all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> would arise <S%H6965><s%> and stand, <S%H5324><s%> each <S%H376><s%> at the entrance <S%H6607><s%> of his tent, <S%H168><s%> and gaze <S%H5027><s%> after <S%H310><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> he entered <S%H935><s%> the tent. <S%H168><s%>

And it came <S%H1961><s%> about, whenever Moses <S%H4872><s%> entered <S%H935><s%> the tent, <S%H168><s%> the pillar <S%H5982><s%> of cloud <S%H6051><s%> would descend <S%H3381><s%> and stand <S%H5975><s%> at the entrance <S%H6607><s%> of the tent; <S%H168><s%> and the Lord would speak <S%H1696><s%> with Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

When all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> the pillar <S%H5982><s%> of cloud <S%H6051><s%> standing <S%H5975><s%> at the entrance <S%H6607><s%> of the tent, <S%H168><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> would arise <S%H6965><s%> and worship, <S%H7812><s%> each <S%H376><s%> at the entrance <S%H6607><s%> of his tent. <S%H168><s%>

Thus the Lord <S%H3068><s%> used to speak <S%H1696><s%> to Moses <S%H4872><s%> face <S%H6440><s%> to face, <S%H6440><s%> just <S%H9201><s%> as a man <S%H376><s%> speaks <S%H1696><s%> to his friend. <S%H7453><s%> When Moses returned <S%H7725><s%> to the camp, <S%H4264><s%> his servant <S%H8334><s%> Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun, <S%H5126><s%> a young <S%H5288><s%> man, <S%H5288><s%> would not depart <S%H4185><s%> from the tent. <S%H168><s%>

Then Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> "See, <S%H7200><s%> Thou dost say <S%H559><s%> to me, 'Bring <S%H5927><s%> up this <S%H2088><s%> people! <S%H5971><s%>' But Thou Thyself <S%H859><s%> hast not let me know <S%H3045><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> Thou wilt send <S%H7971><s%> with me. Moreover, Thou hast said, <S%H559><s%> 'I have known <S%H3045><s%> you by name, <S%H8034><s%> and you have also <S%H1571><s%> found <S%H4672><s%> favor <S%H2580><s%> in My sight. <S%H5869><s%>'

"Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore, I pray <S%H4994><s%> Thee, if <S%H518><s%> I have found <S%H4672><s%> favor <S%H2580><s%> in Thy sight, <S%H5869><s%> let me know <S%H3045><s%> Thy ways, <S%H1870><s%> that I may know <S%H3045><s%> Thee, so <S%H4616><s%> that I may find <S%H4672><s%> favor <S%H2580><s%> in Thy sight. <S%H5869><s%> Consider <S%H7200><s%> too, that this <S%H2088><s%> nation <S%H1471><s%> is Thy people. <S%H5971><s%>"
And He said, <S%H559><s%> "My presence <S%H6440><s%> shall go <S%H1980><s%> [with you,] and I will give <S%H5117><s%> you rest. <S%H5117><s%>"
Then he said <S%H559><s%> to Him, "If <S%H518><s%> Thy presence <S%H6440><s%> does not go <S%H1980><s%> [with us,] do not lead <S%H5927><s%> us up from here. <S%H2088><s%>

"For how <S%H4100><s%> then <S%H645><s%> can it be known <S%H3045><s%> that I have found <S%H4672><s%> favor <S%H2580><s%> in Thy sight, <S%H5869><s%> I and Thy people <S%H5971><s%>? Is it not by Thy going <S%H1980><s%> with us, so that we, I and Thy people, <S%H5971><s%> may be distinguished <S%H6395><s%> from all <S%H3605><s%> the [other] people <S%H5971><s%> who <S%H834><s%> are upon the face <S%H6440><s%> of the earth <S%H127><s%>?"

And the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> "I will also <S%H1571><s%> do <S%H6213><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> thing <S%H1697><s%> of which <S%H834><s%> you have spoken; <S%H1696><s%> for you have found <S%H4672><s%> favor <S%H2580><s%> in My sight, <S%H5869><s%> and I have known <S%H3045><s%> you by name. <S%H8034><s%>"
Then Moses said, <S%H559><s%> "I pray <S%H4994><s%> Thee, show <S%H7200><s%> me Thy glory! <S%H9202><s%>"

And He said, <S%H559><s%> "I Myself <S%H589><s%> will make all <S%H3605><s%> My goodness <S%H2898><s%> pass <S%H5674><s%> before <S%H5921><s%> <S%H6440><s%> you, and will proclaim <S%H7121><s%> the name <S%H8034><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you; and I will be gracious <S%H2603><s%> to whom <S%H834><s%> I will be gracious, <S%H2603><s%> and will show <S%H7355><s%> compassion <S%H7355><s%> on whom <S%H834><s%> I will show <S%H7355><s%> compassion. <S%H7355><s%>"
But He said, <S%H559><s%> "You cannot <S%H3201><s%> <S%H3808><s%> see <S%H7200><s%> My face, <S%H6440><s%> for no <S%H3808><s%> man <S%H120><s%> can see <S%H7200><s%> Me and live! <S%H2421><s%>"
Then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> "Behold, <S%H2009><s%> there is a place <S%H4725><s%> by Me, and you shall stand <S%H5324><s%> [there] on the rock; <S%H6697><s%>

and it will come <S%H1961><s%> about, while My glory <S%H9202><s%> is passing <S%H5674><s%> by, that I will put <S%H7760><s%> you in the cleft <S%H5366><s%> of the rock <S%H6697><s%> and cover <S%H9601><s%> you with My hand <S%H3709><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> I have passed <S%H5674><s%> by.
"Then I will take <S%H5493><s%> My hand <S%H3709><s%> away <S%H5493><s%> and you shall see <S%H7200><s%> My back, <S%H268><s%> but My face <S%H6440><s%> shall not be seen. <S%H7200><s%>"
